name: Mark J. CONWAY and Mollie M. Conway, Individually and as Parents and Natural Guardians of Madison C. Conway, a minor, Petitioners, v. Amy YAVOREK, and Ob-Gyn Consultants, Ltd., Respondents

parties: Mark J. CONWAY and Mollie M. Conway, Individually and as Parents and Natural Guardians of Madison C. Conway, a minor, Petitioners, v. Amy YAVOREK, and Ob-Gyn Consultants, Ltd., Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 28th day of February, 2001, the Petition For Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED and this matter is VACATED and REMANDED to the Superior Court for further consideration in light of this Court’s decision in Fancsali v. University Health Center, 761 A.2d 1159 (Pa.2000).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
766 A.2d 854
Mark J. CONWAY and Mollie M. Conway, Individually and as Parents and Natural Guardians of Madison C. Conway, a minor, Petitioners, v. Amy YAVOREK, and Ob-Gyn Consultants, Ltd., Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 28, 2001.
